import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react"; import "./style.css"; import { history } from '../../helpers'; import i18n from "i18next"; import { routeConstants } from "../../constants"; class PrivacyPolicyMain extends Component { handleBackButton(){ history.push(`${routeConstants.LANDINGPAGE}`); } componentDidMount() { document.body.dir = i18n.dir(); } render() { const language = localStorage.getItem("i18nextLng"); return (

Mazadat Platform Privacy Policy

  1. Introduction and Consent

This Privacy Policy describes the manner in which Mazadat and its affiliates (collectively "Mazadat", “ we”, “us” or “our”) collect, store, protect, use and process your personal information through the Mazadat Platform (including all its related sub-domains, sites, services and tools). The term “personal information” means personally identifiable information which can be associated with a specific individual and can be used to ascertain the identity of that individual. Mazadat does not consider anonymized information or non-personally identifiable data to constitute personal information, as it cannot be used to ascertain the identity of a specific individual. Mazadat collects personal information from you when you access and use the Mazadat Platform and the Service provided thereby (including, without limitation, when you register as a user, create an account, when you offer/list, buy or sell items and when you interact with the Content posted on the Mazadat Platform).

By accessing and using the Mazadat Platform and the Service and by providing us with your personal information, you are expressly consenting to the practices described in this Privacy Policy and to Mazadat collecting, processing and sharing your personal information in accordance with the terms of this Privacy Policy.

This Privacy Policy may be updated and amended by Mazadat at any time and at its sole discretion, whereby such updated Privacy Policy shall be effective upon being posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform. Your continued use of and access to the Mazadat Platform will constitute your express consent to Mazadat continuing to collect, store, protect, use and process your personal information in accordance with the terms of the updated/amended Privacy Policy.

You understand and agree that you are solely responsible for reviewing this Privacy Policy and all other policies linked herein. Mazadat encourages you to check the Mazadat Platform regularly for the announcement of any amendments to our Privacy Policy.

In this Privacy Policy, terms not defined herein shall have the meanings given to them under the User Agreement.

  1. Topics Covered under this Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy shall cover the following topics:

  • Our collection of your personal information.
  • Purposes for which Mazadat collects, stores, uses and processes your personal information.
  • Updating the Privacy Policy.
  • Accessing, reviewing and amending your personal information.
  • Entities with whom we will share your personal information.
  • Marketing and communication.
  • Protecting your personal information.
  • General provisions.
  1. Our Collection of Your Personal Information

Mazadat collects your personal information for the purposes set out under this Privacy Policy and in order to provide and continually improve the Mazadat Platform and the Service provided to users of the Mazadat Platform.

The types of personal information collected from you by Mazadat include, but shall not be limited to, the following:

  • Information Collected upon Registration with the Mazadat Platform: We receive and store any information you provide when creating an account/registering with the Mazadat Platform through the My Account section. As part of your registration with or use of the Mazadat Platform, you will be requested to provide us with certain personal information, including, but not limited to, the following:
  • your name (first name and last name);
  • email address;
  • mobile number;
  • shipping address;
  • gender;
  • valid proof of identification (e.g. in the form of a copy of your passport, resident’s visa or permit, national ID card and/or driver’s license); and
  • other similar information as well as some additional information about you such as your date of birth or other identifying information.

Mazadat may additionally collect selected financial information from you (including credit card, debit card and/or bank account details) for billing purposes and in order to complete transactions/orders concluded and paid for via the Mazadat Platform.

  • Automatically Collected Information: We automatically collect and store certain types of information about your use of and access to the Mazadat Platform, including transactional information (such as offering/listing, buying and/or selling items) and such other information about your interaction with the Service and the Content available on the Mazadat Platform (such as your search histories, adding and/or removing items from your cart, posting comments, questions and feedback, interacting with other users on the Mazadat Platform, interacting with users invited by you to register to the Mazadat Platform, using the chat/messaging feature available on the Mazadat Platform, completing questionnaires/surveys, and contacting Mazadat via phone, email or other forms of communication).

Other automatically collected information include, but shall not be limited to, the following:

  • Device Identifiers:

We collect device-specific information, including, but not limited to, device type, operating system version, browser type and version, hardware capabilities such as Bluetooth and NFC communication capabilities, and the mobile network being used on the device through which you are accessing the Mazadat Platform. Device identifiers shall be associated with Your Account on the Mazadat Platform.

  • Device Phonebook:

Depending on your device permissions, if you access or use the Mazadat Platform, we may collect your phonebook stored on your device in order to allow you to send invitations to individuals listed in your device’s phonebook.

You may opt out of our usage of your device’s phonebook through disabling and/or denying the Mazadat Platform’s access to your device’s phonebook, although doing so may render certain features of the Mazadat Platform unavailable to you, particularly your ability to invite others through using the Mazadat SMS invitation feature.

  • Device Location Information:

Depending on your device permissions, if you access or use the Mazadat Platform, we automatically collect and process information about the actual location of the device being used to access the Mazadat Platform. We use various technologies to determine the device’s location, including IP address, GPS, Wi-Fi access points and mobile towers. Your device’s location data allows you to view Collection Points as well as items/products and services near you in order to improve your user experience.

You may opt out of our usage of your device’s location through disabling your device’s location services and/or denying the Mazadat Platform’s access to your device’s location, although doing so may render certain features of the Mazadat Platform unavailable to you and may interfere with the functioning and/or your use of the Mazadat Platform.

           

  • User Activity and Login Data

We collect data in relation to user login and use of the Mazadat Platform. Information/data collected by Mazadat in this respect include, but shall not be limited to, (a) your login information (including your email address, your username, password, registration date, date of last password change, and records of successful and unsuccessful login attempts); (b) the internet protocol (IP) address used to connect your computer/device to the internet; (c) your internet service provider (ISP); (d) your device’s time zone settings; (e) date and time stamp of each of your visits to the Mazadat Platform; (f) navigation information (e.g. the pages you visit on the Mazadat Platform, the order in which you visit the Content available on the Mazadat Platform, searches you have performed, items which you have added and/or removed from your cart, listings/ads/banners which you have clicked on, the duration of your visits on the Mazadat Platform, and the sites from which you accessed the Mazadat Platform); and (g) device metrics such as when a device is in use, application usage, connectivity data, and any errors or event failures.

  • Cookies and Similar Technologies:

Like many websites, we use "cookies" technology and other unique identifiers to store your preferences. “Cookies” are text files with small pieces of data (such as a username and password) that are transferred to your browser or device and that are used to identify your computer/device as you use a computer/device network. Cookies allow us to obtain certain types of information (including the date and time of your visit(s), your browsing history, your preferences, and your username) when your web browser or device accesses the Mazadat Platform and other content served by or on behalf of Mazadat on other websites. We use cookies to enhance your experience on the Mazadat Platform by remembering your preferences. The cookies we use do not reveal any personal information about you.

For further information on our cookies policy, please refer to Section (9) of this Privacy Policy.

  • Information Collected at Collection Points: As part of your pick-up and drop-off process at the Collection Points, you are required to present the Mazadat employee(s) stationed at the relevant Collection Point with a valid proof of identification (e.g. in the form of a copy of your passport, resident’s visa or permit, national ID card and/or driver’s license). IDs and other valid forms of identification presented to Mazadat employees at the Collection Points shall be used to verify your identity and shall be stored, used and processed by Mazadat in accordance with the terms of this Privacy Policy.

 

  • Information from Other Sources: We might receive additional personal information about you from other third-party and/or public sources, such as updated delivery and address information from our couriers, which we use to correct our records and deliver your next purchase more easily. Other third-party sources may include government institutions and/or other public bodies.
  1. Purposes for Which Mazadat Collects, Stores, Uses and Processes Your Personal Information

 

We collect, store, use and process your personal information for, amongst other things, the following purposes:

  • providing you with access to the Mazadat Platform;
  • providing the Service to you;
  • providing customer support to you;
  • measuring and improving our Service and your use of/access to the Mazadat Platform;
  • monitoring your interaction with Content made available on the Mazadat Platform;
  • offering you tailored/personalized Content;
  • advertising, whereby we use your personal information to display interest-based ads for features, products, and services that might be of interest to you;
  • analyzing user trends and improving the administration of the Mazadat Platform;
  • preventing illegal activities, fraud and spam activities as well as providing you with a safe and secure platform;
  • ensuring compliance with legal and/or regulatory obligations;
  • making disclosures to law enforcement agencies, government agencies or other third parties where we are compelled so to do by court order or similar legal procedure; where we are required to disclose your personal information to comply with law; where we are cooperating with an ongoing law enforcement investigation or where we have a good faith belief that our disclosure of your personal information is necessary to prevent physical harm or financial loss, to report suspected illegal activity or to investigate a possible violation of the User Agreement, other agreements and the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy; or protect the rights, property, or safety of Mazadat, our users or others;
  • preforming and implementing the User Agreement, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy and other policies posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform;
  • troubleshooting problems;
  • taking legal action or other procedures;
  • collecting fees; and
  • providing you with promotional and marketing emails and verifying information you give us with third parties (e.g. we may share some of the personal information you give us with institutions which conduct background checks, credit rating institutions, financial service providers, banks or credit card authorisation, processing and verification services or with third parties for fraud screening purposes)
  1. Updating the Privacy Policy


Mazadat may, at its sole discretion, amend/update this Privacy Policy from time to time. You acknowledge and agree that Mazadat shall endeavor to give you notice of any amendment to this Privacy Policy which materially increases your obligations or decreases your rights under the Privacy Policy (" Substantial Amendment"). You acknowledge and agree that Mazadat, at its sole discretion and without liability, may make amendments that are not Substantial Amendments without your further specific consent at any time with immediate effect by posting a notice of the amendment on the Mazadat Platform. If you do not agree to be bound by the amended/updated Privacy Policy please delete your account and do not access, register with or continue to use the Mazadat Platform. Your continued use of and access to the Mazadat Platform will constitute your express consent to the terms of the amended/updated Privacy Policy.

  1. Accessing, Reviewing and Amending Your Personal Information

You can access, review and modify your personal information on the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform. If your personal information changes in any way, is incorrectly presented on the Mazadat Platform, or is outdated, incomplete, inaccurate or misleading in any way you must immediately update or correct your personal information (as applicable) by accessing the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform or, alternatively, by contacting Customer Support.

The information and data we collect about you in accordance with this Privacy Policy may be stored and processed inside as well as outside the Arab Republic of Egypt on secure servers. We shall retain your personal information during and following the end of your use of the Mazadat Platform and the Service as required: (a) to fulfil the purposes for which the information was collected; (b) to comply with law and regulation; (c) to comply with accounting and auditing requirements; (d) for technical troubleshooting requirements; (e) to prevent fraud; (f) to assist in any legal investigations; and (g) to take legal or any other actions otherwise permitted by law.

  1. Entities with whom We Will Share Your Personal Information

We share users’ personal information collected in accordance with this Privacy Policy with subsidiaries of Mazadat and with such other third parties as may be necessary to achieve the purposes set out under Section (4) of this Privacy Policy. You hereby acknowledge and agree that we may share your personal information as follows:

  • Third-Party Service Providers: We employ other companies and individuals, located inside as well as outside the Arab Republic of Egypt, to perform functions and deliver services on our behalf. Examples of such services include cloud storage, fulfilling orders for products/items or services, conducting background, creditworthiness and other checks, delivering packages, analyzing data, providing marketing and advertising services, providing search results and links (including paid listings and links), processing payments and providing payment services, transmitting content, and providing customer service. These third-party service providers have access to personal information needed to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes. Third-party service providers are required to adhere to laws and regulations governing data protection.
  • Corporate Affiliates and Group Companies: We may share your information/data with other Mazadat group companies and affiliates of Mazadat which are located inside as well as outside the Arab Republic of Egypt and which help us in providing business operation services such as product enhancements, customer support, fraud detection mechanisms and marketing. Mazadat group companies and affiliates are required to adhere to the same standards of information/data protection to which we are required to adhere.

 

  • Business Transfers: As we continue to develop our business, we might sell or buy other businesses or services. In such transactions, user information generally is one of the transferred business assets but remains subject to the terms and conditions set out in any pre-existing Privacy Policy (unless, the user consents otherwise). Also, in the event that Mazadat or substantially all of its assets are acquired, user information will be one of the transferred assets.
  • Protection of Mazadat and Others: We release account and other personal information when we believe release is appropriate to (a) comply with the law (including release of information to law enforcement authorities, regulators, governmental or public bodies); (b) enforce or apply the User Agreement, other agreements and the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy; or (c) protect the rights, property, or safety of Mazadat, our users, or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
  • Publicly Available Information : When you post an item/product for sale using our Service or when you contact/interact with other users on the Mazadat Platform, you may choose to make certain personal information visible to other users of the Mazadat Platform. This may include your first name, last name, your email address, your location and your contact number.{" "}

 

Other than as set out above, you will receive notice when personal information about you might be shared with third parties, and you will have an opportunity to consent to the sharing of your personal information.

  1. Marketing and Communication

You hereby expressly consent and agree to us communicating with you via email, SMS or in-app notification in connection with the Mazadat Platform and the Service to, amongst other things, confirm your registration, inform you in case your ad listing has become live/expired, inform you that your item(s)/product(s) has been purchased or that your auction has been concluded, and deliver other transactional messages in relation to the Service. As it is imperative for us to provide you such transactional messages you may not be able to opt-out of such messages. However, you can ask us to stop sending you marketing communication at any time by clicking on the opt-out link in the email sent to you or by reaching out to Customer Support.

You may receive marketing and other communications from us if you:

  • have requested such information from us;
  • post/listed item(s)/product(s) on the Mazadat Platform;
  • use the Mazadat Platform or the Service; or
  • registered for a promotion or other additional service through the Mazadat Platform.
  1. Cookies

We use cookies, pixels, and other technologies (collectively, "cookies") to recognize and track your browser, device or activity across different applications, learn more about your interests/preferences, provide you with essential features and services and for additional purposes, including:

  • Recognizing you when you login to the Mazadat Platform and use the Service as well as storing your login credentials so that you are not required to reenter your login credentials every time you access your account. This allows us to provide you with product recommendations, display personalized content, and provide other customized features and services.
  • Keeping track of your specified preferences. This allows us to honor your preferences, such as whether or not you would like to see interest-based ads and your language preferences. You may set your preferences throughthe Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform.
  • Keeping track of items kept in your cart.
  • Conducting research and diagnostics to improve the Mazadat Platform’s content, products, and services.
  • Detecting and Preventing fraudulent activity.
  • Improving security.
  • Delivering content, including ads and listings, relevant to your interests on third-party sites.
  • This allows us to measure and analyze the performance of the Service.

You are always free to decline or refuse all or some of our cookies if your browser permits, although doing so may interfere with the functioning and/or your use of the Mazadat Platform.

For further information about the type of cookies used by the Mazadat Platform, please contact Customer Support.

  1. Protecting Your Personal Information
  • By providing us with your personal information, you consent to the transfer of your personal information outside of the Arab Republic of Egypt. We take precautions to safeguard all your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure and we shall adhere to applicable laws and regulations in our transfer of your personal information outside of the Arab Republic of Egypt.
  • All personal information is encrypted. However, the internet is not a secure medium and we cannot guarantee the privacy of your personal information.
  • You must enter your username and password each time you want to access the Your Account section on the Mazadat Platform, offer items(s)/product(s) or conclude transactions on the Mazadat Platform.
  • Choose your password carefully using unique numbers, letters and special characters. We recommend that you frequently update your password.
  • Never share your username and/or password with anyone.
  • Following your registration on the Mazadat Platform, you should not post any personal information (including any financial information) anywhere on the Mazadat Platform other than on the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform. 
  • Restricting the posting of personal information to the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform protects you from the possibility of fraud or identity theft. The posting by you of any personal information anywhere on the Mazadat Platform other than on the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform shall be at your own risk and may lead to the suspension of your use of and access to the Mazadat Platform.
  • If you are concerned that your username or password has been compromised, please contact Customer Support immediately and ensure you change your password by logging onto the Your Account section of the Mazadat.
  • You agree to use any personal information received from another user of the Mazadat Platform in relation to a transaction on the Mazadat Platform solely in relation to such transaction.
  1. General Provisions
  • The Mazadat Platform may include links to third-party websites that are controlled by and maintained by others and which are completely unrelated to Mazadat. If you link or access such third-party websites, you will become subject to the privacy policies of said third-party websites. Any link to such third-party websites is not an endorsement of such websites, their content or their services or a warranty that such websites will be free of viruses or other such items of a destructive nature.
  • We do not tolerate spam. To report Mazadat Platform related spam or spoof emails, please forward any such emails to noreply@mazat.at. You may not use our communication tools to send spam or otherwise send content that would violate the User Agreement or the provisions of this Privacy Policy. We automatically scan and may manually filter messages to check for spam, viruses, phishing attacks and other malicious activity or illegal or prohibited content.
  • We cannot control nor guarantee the privacy of your personal information when you share personal information with other users of the Mazadat Platform. We therefore encourage you to practice caution when sharing your personal information with other users of the Mazadat Platform.
  • For any privacy-related matters or questions or for additional information, please check the privacy settings on the Your Account section or contact Customer Support.
) } } export default PrivacyPolicyMain;
